txt.en: Occasionally as you play, tutorial hints may appear to help explain some aspect of the game. These hints will either appear here on the left-side of the screen or show up as Question Mark icons on the right-side. Click on those icons to see what information they contain.

Occasionally as you play, tutorial hints may appear to help explain some aspect of the game. These hints will either appear here on the left-side of the screen or show up as Question Mark icons on the right-side. Click on those icons to see what information they contain.
